definitions.text: a period of time spent sleeping
examples: he felt better after a little sleep
there wasn't time for a nap

definitions.text: a soft or fuzzy surface texture
the yarn (as in a rug or velvet or corduroy) that stands up from the weave
examples: for uniform color and texture tailors cut velvet with the pile running the same direction

definitions.text: sleeping for a short period of time (usually not in bed)
a card game similar to whist; usually played for stakes

examples: She naps everyday after lunch for an hour
